text:
Hey <@UE70ED6JV> Its a bit easier to read and write if you inline these attributes into the module itself.

```{% dnd_module 'name' path="path", width=58, line_type="solid", etc... %}```
Hi <@UQWGKUEN7> thanks for you answer, could you please show me how this code will work properly, please see screenshot thanks
<@UE70ED6JV> Sorry the 58 was just a random number - it actually needs to be 1-12 I believe. Because it needs to take up a certain amount of columns in the bootstrap grid.
actually this code is not working Only in *template preview*, but in page editor, when I update it to 100% it is working
I wonder why it is not updating in template level preview
in page content editor it is working properly when I update it to 100%

<@UE70ED6JV> in your screenshot you had a typo
`width-58` should be `width=58`
